info.name: 小说网站净化
info.description: 小说网站净化，比如说笔趣阁之类，去掉了大部分广告，正在进行美化，网址待补充

style.css:
@-moz-document domain("www.biquge.com.cn"), domain("www.jx.la"), domain("www.biquge.se"), domain("www.biquge.tw"), domain("www.qu.la"), domain("www.uukanshu.com"), domain("www.biquge.com.cn"), domain("www.xbiquge.cc"), domain("www.biquge5200.cc"), domain("www.b5200.net"), domain("www.xbiquge.la"), domain("www.shuquge.com"), domain("www.biquge.info"), domain("ww.37zw.net"), domain("www.sbiquge.com"), domain("www.mibaoge.com"), domain("www.biqubao.com"), domain("www.xsbiquge.com"), domain("www.xbiqugew.net"), domain("www.booktxt.com"), domain("www.lewxs.com"), domain("www.biqugexx.com"), domain("www.52bqg.com"), domain("www.biqugezw.net"), domain("www.biqubu.com"), domain("www.bqg9527.com"), domain("www.biqukan.com"), domain("www.abiqugew.com"), domain("www.biquge.li"), domain("www.xsbiquge.com"), domain("www.biquges.com"), domain("www.biqugeii.com"), domain("www.qingkanshu.cc"), domain("www.4yxs.net"), domain("www.yuetutu.com"), domain("www.xxbqg5200.com"), domain("www.biqukan.cc"), domain("www.ibiquge.net"), domain("www.biqukan.net"), domain("www.biqiugex.com"), domain("www.yuyouge.com"), domain("www.ddxsw.la"), domain("www.360xs.cc"), domain("www.80zw.cc"), domain("www.fqxsw.cc"), domain("www.xssk.la"), domain("www.yb3.cc"), domain("www.biqubao.com"), domain("www.022003.com"), domain("www.qishus.com"), domain("www.jingcaiyuedu8.com"), domain("www.xshangshu.com"), domain("www.tushuguan.cc"), domain("www.txtle.com"), domain("www.txtle.com"), domain("www.52shuku.me"), domain("www.xxqb5200.com"), domain("www.xuanhutang.com"), domain("www.55shuba.com"), domain("www.aishuxs.com"), domain("www.yuyouge.com"), domain("www.ymxxs.com"), domain("www.abiqugew.com"), domain("www.huaidan1.com"), domain("www.woaidu.la"), domain("") {
/*隐藏顶部登录栏*/
#listtj,
#userinfo,
#headright,
#headleft,
#sf-navtab,
#compZnNav,
#Top,
#page-header,
#topnav {
	display: none;
}
.ywtop,
.m_head,
.breadcrumb,
.header,
.head-wrap,
.head-nav,
.navbar-fixed-top,
.hd,
.sf-logo,
.sf-altnav,
.fl,
.top-bar,
.menu,
.topbar,
.yd_ad,
.top,
.search_box,
.nav,
.top_box,
.logo_box,
.logo_left,
.logo_right,
.link {
	display: none;
}
.header_logo,
.logo {
	visibility: hidden;
}

/*隐藏顶部推荐栏*/
.dahengfu,
.lm,
.userpanel,
.logo,
.zuixin,
.shijian,
.bdsharebuttonbox,
.bdshare-button-style0-16,
.linkk,
.red,
.tjlist,
.bdshare_b,
.con_top,
.nav,
.path,
.link,
.srarchHot,
.MessageDiv,
.listtj,
.m_menu,
.fr,
.adlist,
.col-md-8,
.booktag,
.mg0,
.tac,
.hd,
.search,
.baidu,
.info,
.bann-type,
.TextNav {
	display: none;
}
#queries,
#Span1,
#Span2,
#bdshare,
#sidebar,
#infoo,
#a_head {
	display: none;
}

/*隐藏底部推荐与版权说明*/
.mulu-tuijian,
.tujian_c,
.hot-recommend,
.cont_tuijian,
.friendlink,
.reader_mark1,
.reader_mark0,
.reader_mark,
.links,
.hidden-xs,
.panel-friendlink,
.tuijian,
.finfo,
.sl,
.copyright,
.blocklongtitle,
.blocklongcontent,
.foot_Navi,
.Copyright,
.ulrow,
.footer,
.TextNotice,
.shuqian,
.yd_ad1,
.yd_ad2,
.readacbtn,
.recommend,
.favorite,
.bookshelf,
.readerts {

}
#friendlink,
#firendlink,
#foottips,
#contfoot,
#friendLinks,
#a_footer,
#LinkMenu,
#foot_Navi,
#Copyright {
	display: none;
}
#footer,
#divfoot {
	visibility: hidden;
}
.footer,
.foot {
	visibility: hidden;
}

/*隐藏浮动推广*/
.sao_mobile_box,
.paihang,
.tips,
.tags,
.adhtml,
.comment,
.mr20,
.btn-primary,

}

#fsds,

}


#content,
div#content,
.box_con #content {
	font-family: "Noto Serif SC", "Noto Serif", "Noto Serif CJK SC", 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, 'PingFang SC', 'Hiragino Sans GB', 'WenQuanYi Micro Hei', 'Microsoft YaHei', serif;
}
